sources.name: Employees1
sources.description: Source employees file, changes every day

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		Function as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as string,
		EndDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	wildcardPaths:['SampleData/Emps/today/*.csv']) ~> Employees1
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees
source(output(
		
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '',
	format: 'query') ~> source2
NullFilter derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID),
		StartDate = toDate(StartDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		EndDate = toDate(EndDate,'MM/dd/yyyy'),
		processtime = currentTimestamp()) ~> TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs
TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs, DimEmployees lookup(TypeConversionsAndSetAttrs@EmpID == DimEmployees@EmpID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupIDs
NormNames split(isNull(iscurrent),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)
NameNorm2, DimEmployees exists(NameNorm2@EmpID == DimEmployees@EmpID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> checkForChanges
ConditionalSplit1@NewRow derive(iscurrent = 1,
		surrogatekey = toString(crc32(ConditionalSplit1@NewRow@EmpID,EmpFunction))) ~> SetAttrsForNew
checkForChanges derive(iscurrent = 0) ~> SetAttrsInactive
checkForChanges derive(iscurrent = 1) ~> SetAttrsUpdate
LookupIDs select() ~> NormNames
SetAttrsInactive select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		Status,
		EndDate,
		iscurrent,
		processtime
	)) ~> InactiveFields
InactiveFields alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Employees1 filter(!isNull(EmpID)) ~> NullFilter
ConditionalSplit1@CheckForUpdates select() ~> NameNorm2
DimEmployees derive(EmpID = toInteger(EmpID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
SetAttrsForNew sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkNew
SetAttrsUpdate sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Region as string,
		Status as string,
		EmpFunction as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkUpdates
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		EmpID as integer,
		surrogatekey as string,
		Level as string,
		Role as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as date,
		iscurrent as integer,
		processtime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	batchSize: 50,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['EmpID'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> sinkInactive
